What is (are) Age-related Macular Degeneration ?,"Age-related macular degeneration, or AMD, is a disease that blurs the sharp, central vision you need for straight-ahead activities such as reading, sewing, and driving. AMD affects the macula, the part of the eye that allows you to see fine detail. AMD causes no pain.",NIHSeniorHealth,Age-related Macular Degeneration
